text.0:
After a relatively cold Oct, global temps shot back up in Nov, setting a new record by a fair margin. Nov 2020 was around 1C warmer than temps in the late 1970s in ERA5 and around 1.4C warmer than in the late 1800s.

2020 is once again odds-on favorite to be the warmest on record https://t.co/PptClEjh75
